verbs.description: platform wars creator burnout and the power of online communities all things [V: video] podcast matt labate is the svp digital at fine brothers entertainment a next - gen media company and leader in digital programming matt started his career in independent film then joined the sony pictures digital team after a brief entrepreneurial stint he joined revision3 prior to its acquisition by discovery and then served as vp creative at reach agency before making the move to fbe in the latest episode of all things video we discuss the fine brothers entertainment power vp creative reach agency power of online communities facebook svp sony pictures twitter matt labate
